name: Dino Gods
description:
A game created using PowerPoint? No way!

I created Dinogods to explore my ideas about religion in a fun way,  this "point and click adventure" (If you can call that a game made on PowerPoint) takes the player into a world where human gods are dinosaurs.
If you end up playing the game I'd love to read your comments and what you think of it and what's your takeaway.

I hope you enjoy it. Thanks
